item.title: The minority language typing experience
item.description: How much work is it to type languages with tonal markers in their orthographies?

item.title: Collaborative Mapping
item.description: Action-research group of enthusiasts aimed to foster citizen innovation and collective intelligence through Voluntary Geographic Informationand that result in collaborative maps at the service of citizens.
